Package javaValidation.Validation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassAndFunctionBoundsFinder
    This class iterates over a list of strings representing the contents of a java file searching for the bounds of the class and functions found within.
    FileInformation
    Looks for various details within the given file and stores the information in a list of arrays, which contains a line number and what was found.
    FileParser
    This class takes a file path and will create a list of strings corresponding to each line in the file.
    FileValidator
    This class takes an array of file path arguments and runs various validation processes on each.
    FunctionBounds
    This class holds the bounds of anything that can be described with an opening and closing int.
    KeywordFinder
    Finds instances of the keywords defined within this class.
    KeywordInstance
    Holds a line number and keyword.
    ListToString
    This class appends each item in a list to a string
    MultiLineValidator
    This class finds validation errors that span multiple lines
    QuoteAndCommentReplacer
    This class 'sanitizes' a list of strings that represents the contents of a java file.
    SectionToRemove
    This class holds the bounds of a section of text that is intended to be replaced in a file.
    SingleLineError
    This class holds information about an error that exists on a single line within a java file.
    SingleLineValidator  
    TextTransform
    This class adds html text to strings to format the output
